categories: Category:Outer Rim Territories planets on the Hydian Way

nodes.text: Praadost II was a planet near the Kwymar sector.

During the Clone Wars, Praadost II was located within Separatist space. Shortly before the Kwymar Suppressions, it aligned itself with the Rebel Alliance and was subjugated by the Galactic Empire, the forces of which included Beilert Valance. Many civilians died in the battle. Praadost II was located on the Hydian Way.
